org.jboss.aerogear.android.authorization.oauth2

Class OAuth2AuthzService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • org.jboss.aerogear.android.authorization.oauth2.OAuth2AuthzService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class OAuth2AuthzService
extends android.app.Service
    This service manages tokens for Authorization sessions. It can also perform basic OAuth2 Access Token/ Authorization exchange and manages refresh tokens.

      • fetchAccessToken

        public String fetchAccessToken(String accountId,
                               OAuth2Properties config)
                        throws OAuth2AuthorizationException
        This will exchange an Authorization token for an Access Token
        Parameters:
        accountId - the ID for the OAuth2AuthzSession
        config - the config
        Returns:
        an accesstoken
        Throws:
        OAuth2AuthorizationException - if something went wrong in the exchange

      • addAccount

        public void addAccount(OAuth2AuthzSession account)
        Put a session into the store.
        Parameters:
        account - a new session

      • hasAccount

        public boolean hasAccount(String accountId)
        Will check if there is an account which has previously been granted an authorization code and access code
        Parameters:
        accountId - the accountId to check
        Returns:
        true if there is a session for the account.

      • getAccount

        public OAuth2AuthzSession getAccount(String accountId)
        Returns the OAuth2AuthzSession for accountId if any
        Parameters:
        accountId - the accountId to look up
        Returns:
        an OAuth2AuthzSession or null

      • getAccounts

        public List<String> getAccounts()
        Fetches all OAuth2AuthzSessions in the system.
        Returns:
        all OAuth2AuthzSession's in the system
